# LibrarySongSortProperties

**Protocol**

Song properties your app uses to sort results for a library request.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol LibrarySongSortProperties
```

## Instance Properties

- **albumTitle**: The title of the album the song appears on.
- **artistName**: The artist’s name.
- **composerName**: The name of the song’s composer.
- **discNumber**: The disc number of the song.
- **duration**: The duration of the song.
- **lastPlayedDate**: The date when the user last played the song on this device.
- **libraryAddedDate**: The date when the user added the song to the library.
- **playCount**: The number of times the user played the song.
- **title**: The title of the song.
- **trackNumber**: The song’s number in the album’s track list.
